definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: The final result is a color painting on top of a monochrome painting.
sentences.chinese: 最後的結果是在單色畫上再畫上顏色。

sentences.english: I create works in the purpose of the modern monochrome combining these characters.
sentences.chinese: 我以融合這些特點的現代性單色畫爲目標而創作作品。

sentences.english: Earlier on, the artist has painted a monochromatic painting, but thought it was not good enough.
sentences.chinese: 早年他畫過一張單色畫，覺得不好看。
